overview: Pude Jaye Mon is a Bangladeshi romantic film released in 2016. Produced by Sony Movies International, the film is written and directed by director duo Apoorva-Rana. It stars Simon Sadiq and Parimoni in lead roles, and Aliraj , Mizu Ahmed , Rebecca etc. in supporting roles. Although Simon and Parimoni had previously acted together in a film titled Ranaplaza , this is the duo's first release.  The film was released in Bangladesh on 29 January 2016. The film was a commercial success. Aliraj won the Best Supporting Actor Award at the 41st National Film Awards for his performance in this film
title: Pure Jay Mon
